description: A listing of Oregon agencies boards and commissions.  The primary intention of this dataset is to be used as a lookup field when inputting data into the the Public Meeting Notices dataset.

metadata.attribution: Department of Administrative Services. Data assembled from the Oregon Blue Book, State Agency Directory, Oregon Accounting Manual and Agency A-Z list on Oregon.gov.
metadata.description: A listing of Oregon agencies boards and commissions.  The primary intention of this dataset is to be used as a lookup field when inputting data into the the Public Meeting Notices dataset.

name: Oregon Agencies, Boards and Commissions
